name: Ryan 🧜🏳️‍⚧️ (@ryanhoulihan@mastodon.social)
summary: So many men’s first instinct is to be condescending, because they think it will immediately place them in a power position over me. But, like, you just told me this interaction matters to you – and you’re emotionally invested in winning it for some reason. With that knowledge alone I could crush you, baby boy
